players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
You: "I didn't kill Bob; I was sleeping when it happened. Charlie's claim may be mistaken. I'm innocent—please consider that before deciding whom to arrest."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is the Mafioso. Bob was killed by Mafia. Arrest her."
Diana: "Charlie, your investigation is helpful. Alice was asleep; no evidence against her. Bob was killed by Mafia. Trust your findings."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
